item.title: How would I add items to clients?
item.dc:creator: @i_defin3_pk i defin3 pk
item.description:
@i_defin3_pk wrote:

How do I add items to clients?

edit: I know its the class8.java but unless you have the dat file for the item it doesn’t appear properly. and how do i know like what to add

like a skillcape is

if(i == 14075) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 960; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 22464; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 43968; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 923; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 919; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 919; class8.anInt174 = 4203; class8.anInt181 = 720; class8.anInt190 = 21; class8.anInt198 = 18; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt165 = 4202; class8.anInt200 = 4204; class8.aString170 = "Attack hood"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Attack skillcape hood.".getBytes(); } but How do i know what to fill it in w/? like

class8.anInt190 = 21; where does the 21 come from? and what does it mean

Read full topic
